comments:
Build: F3
After finishing step E3.1 - E3.3, I wanted to see a preview of this nested 
feature.
The preview page does contain the usual links: "more info", "license" 
and "copyright".  However, because I had not entered values for these sections 
on the documentation page, I get a null pointer exception when I click on the 
hyperlink.  These links should not be shown if there is no corresponding 
file/link/text.

Here is the null pointer exception:
java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.update.internal.ui.forms.InfoLink.linkActivated(InfoLink.java:37)
at org.eclipse.update.ui.forms.internal.HyperlinkHandler.linkActivated
(HyperlinkHandler.java:98)

(HyperlinkHandler.java:76)

at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.readAndDispatch(Display.java:1289)
at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.runEventLoop(Workbench.java:1177)

(InternalBootLoader.java:739)

F4 candidate.

Value: High (NPEs are bad, although the actual impact to the user is not high)
Risk: Loaw (add a check, don't show the link)
Verified...The fix is in the 0621 integration build.
